data.message: Hi, I'm Sabrina Hall and I'm 11 and I know I'm just some kid... But you are my life! Every time I here ' When I'm gone ' I don't like it for the beat, I listen to the words but I don't just listen I feel. Last year before Christmas I was taken away from my dad and he was my world! I was depressed until I listened to your songs. I just wanna say thank you and tbh you should come to Oklahoma! I hope you read this!!
